nodes.text: Morgot was a Skrilling male and an acquaintance of the Jedi Knight Quinlan Vos who lived on Ord Mantell. He was being beaten up by Nastyboy, to whom he owed money, when Aayla Secura and Vos came looking for Morgot. Upon witnessing the scene taking place before them, Aayla proceeded to use a mind trick to persuade the thug to go home. Morgot then told Quinlan where to find the Devaronian Vilmarh Grahrk.
